body.description: Help protect your teeth from weakening enamel and tooth decay with ACT Restoring Zero Alcohol Fluoride Mouthwash, Strengthens Tooth Enamel, Mint Burst. This mouth rinse is designed to help strengthen tooth enamel, remineralize soft spots, prevent cavities and freshen breath. In fact, anticavity rinses like ACT Restoring Mouthwash are up to 70% more effective at reducing cavities versus brushing with a fluoride toothpaste alone. This ACT Restoring Mouthwash comes in a Mint Burst flavor and is an alcohol-free mouthwash. When it comes to strong smiles, trust the No. 1 dentist recommended fluoride brand*. *Among mouth rinses

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Your mouthwash should do more. Find the right solution for you. Superior Cavity Protection Formulated to strengthen teeth and prevent tooth decay, this fluoride mouthwash is alcohol free and comes in three invigorating flavors: Mint, Cinnamon, and Arctic Blast. Strengthens Enamel Help fight cavities with ACT Restoring Mouthwash. It strengthens enamel by remineralizing soft spots for up to 4x stronger teeth. Choose from alcohol-free Mint Burst or invigorating Cool Mint. *In lab studies vs. rinsing with water (baseline). Applies only to 0.05% fluoride formulas. Kills Bad Breath Germs Kiss bad breath goodbye! ACT Total Care Mouthwash provides the same anticavity protection you expect, plus it kills bad breath germs. Swish once a day with Zero Alcohol Fresh Mint or invigorating Icy Clean Mint to prevent cavities, strengthen teeth, and freshen breath. Removes Surface Stains See a whiter smile in four days.* This anticavity mouthwash helps remove surface stains with every swish, plus strengthens enamel and kills bad breath germs. The dye-free and alcohol-free formula comes in Gentle Mint Flavor. *vs. baseline

The ACT Triple Action Formula Freshens, Strengthens and Protects Teeth Freshens Breath So fresh, so clean! All ACT Anticavity Mouthwashes are designed to bust bad breath every time you rinse. Strengthens Out of all fluoride mouth rinses, ACT is the #1 dentist recommended brand.** It’s designed to strengthen enamel for up to 4x stronger teeth.* *In lab studies vs. rinsing with water (baseline). Applies only to 0.05% fluoride formulas. **Among mouth rinses Protects Against Cavities ACT Fluoride Mouthwash helps you go beyond brushing to prevent tooth decay. It strengthens teeth to deliver superior cavity protection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effective, plus love the attached cup dispenser
reviews.reviewText: Does what it's supposed to do. I saw it cheaper at my local drugstore so I was disappointed about that. Otherwise, I really liked the feature of the squeeze cup at the top of the bottle that allows me to dispense the perfect amount every time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Recommended by 1/1 of my dentists
reviews.reviewText: Got this because it has fluoride as recommended by my dentist. I like that the mint isn’t overbearing compared to other brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Top Oral Surgeon Recommends this Product. It's what he uses and he has zero fillings!
reviews.reviewText: I love this product and this came on highest recommendation from our top oral maxillofacial surgeon who specializes in root canals. This is his own personal dental hygeine product of choice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a good item, however I think it was a bit overprices for what you got.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Strengthen your teeth
reviews.reviewText: I love this mouthwash. My dentist recommend it. It helped with strengthen my tooth enamel, overall great product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My go to choice
reviews.reviewText: A lot of these have alcohol in them, which burns my gums. I was really happy to find one that doesn’t.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great, helped reduce tooth sensitivity
reviews.reviewText: I drink filtered water as lead content is pretty high where I live, it had been about two years since I had fluoride in my routine and my teeth started to become over sensitive to brushing and cold items.I decided to order a bottle of this based on reviews and info I found online. I stopped using mouthwash a couple of years ago because a lot of it messes with the PH in your mouth. This stuff works great! helped with sensitivity within a day or two and my teeth feel better in general. My dentist also said I made a great choice picking some of this up.I highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I had some loss of enamel due to health issues and started using this to help remineralize my teeth. My teeth look whiter and stronger after 2 weeks. I do see a lot of people confused about the bottle size difference with the 18oz and 32oz. The 32oz has less fluoride because it's meant to be used TWICE DAILY. It's not "2x" because of the size. The 18oz has more fluoride in it because you only use it once a day. I use it at night. I hate using mouthwash in the morning, so I bought the 18oz so I only have to use it at night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s part of Dr Ellie’s teeth wash programme and I am delighted to be able to get it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 4, 2024
